title: Racing Car -LIVE- Wallpaper v2.2
description:
From time to time the camera zooms in on the leader of the lap (and shakes, as it usually happens with telephoto lenses).
Customize sky or choose auto changing with your preferred frequency.

Choose the cars you want to see on the track (Porsche 911, Ferrari Concept Car, Audi Quattro Concept Car).
Customize speed and size of the cars.

At the same time it's not distracting and works great as a beautiful wallpaper. Graphics is high quality and should work well with every screen.

To set wallpaper go to "Settings" -> "Wallpaper" -> "Live Wallpapers" -> choose "Racing Cars" -> "Set Wallpaper"

Tested on Samsung Galaxy S II with ICS on most popular launchers (Nova, GO Launcher EX, ADW.Launcher, TwLauncher).

What's in this version :

new car: Dodge Viper ACR
performance improvements
fixed problem with locked settings
added safety car (Nissan GT-R)
performance improvements
changes to car's speed computations
media helicopter
new cars
Corvette C6.R
Aston Martin DBR9
Ford GT40
new backgrounds
settings improvements

More info:
